text_raw: And the air is thick with their company as they call to me, their kinsman, making ready to go, shaking the wings of their exultant and terrible youth.
text_clean: and the air be thick with their company a they call to me their kinsman make ready to go shake the wing of their exultant and terrible youth

text_raw: April 26.
text_clean: april

text_raw: Mother is putting my new secondhand clothes in order.
text_clean: mother be putt my new secondhand clothe in order

text_raw: She prays now, she says, that I may learn in my own life and away from home and friends what the heart is and what it feels.
text_clean: she pray now she say that i may learn in my own life and away from home and friend what the heart be and what it feel

text_raw: Amen.
text_clean: amen

text_raw: So be it.
text_clean: so be it

text_raw: Welcome, O life, I go to encounter for the millionth time the reality of experience and to forge in the smithy of my soul the uncreated conscience of my race.
text_clean: welcome o life i go to encounter for the 1000000 time the reality of experience and to forge in the smithy of my soul the uncreated conscience of my race

text_raw: April 27.
text_clean: april

text_raw: Old father, old artificer, stand me now and ever in good stead.
